alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 11:29AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...CAUTION REGARDING HIGH WATER ON THE MENDENHALL RIVER... Despite only light rain showers the rest of today, heavy rain over the past 48 hours caused Mendenhall River to rise to bankful conditions around 4 AM this morning. Some debris has been reported moving down river. Use caution when rafting down the river. As of 10 AM, the rate of rise is starting to slow and a crest below minor flood stage is likely this afternoon. Therefore, no flooding is expected, but we will update should conditions change. For Mendenhall Lake : At 10:15am the stage was 8.34 feet. Flood Stage is 9.0 feet. Forecast: A crest around 8.12 feet is expected around 4:00pm Sunday.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
